title: Paul Maynard – 2017 Speech on Transport Investment in the North
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Paul Maynard, the Parliamentary Under Secretary of State for Rail, at the North of England Transport Summit at the Royal Armouries on 30 November 2017.
